activity_differential: people socializing in a living room
people conversing and interacting at a gathering
people standing and sitting while engaging with each other
description: A group of people are socializing and interacting in a decorated living room with sofas, cushions, chandeliers, and food/drinks on a table. The camera moves around the room, capturing different people standing, sitting, and engaging with each other.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Pillows are inanimate objects and cannot engage in social actions such as 'conversing with.'
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible
